#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- cryaudioimpl.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("CryAudioImpl_uber_0.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Header Files"
		"ATLEntities.h"
		"AudioEvent.h"
		"AudioImpl.h"
		"AudioImplCVars.h"
		"AudioObject.h"
		"AudioTrigger.h"
		"Common.h"
		"resource.h"
		"stdafx.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Source Files"
		"AudioEvent.cpp"
		"AudioImpl.cpp"
		"AudioImplCVars.cpp"
		"AudioObject.cpp"
		"AudioTrigger.cpp"
		"Common.cpp"
		"CryAudioImpl.cpp"
)

add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"stdafx.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

if(AUDIO_PORTAUDIO)
	CryEngineModule(CryAudioImplPortAudio FORCE_SHARED PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio/Implementations")
	target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE -DPORTAUDIO_FOR_$<UPPER_CASE:$<CONFIG>>)
	target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ../../Common)
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE libsndfile PortAudio)
	copy_portaudio()
else()
	CryFileContainer(CryAudioImplPortAudio SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio/Implementations")
endif()
